192.168.27.40/30


       192.168.27.40  => 11000000.10101000.00011011.00101000
/30 => 255.255.255.252=> 11111111.11111111.11111111.11111100


11000000.10101000.00011011.001010 00
11111111.11111111.11111111.111111 00

Network Address:

11000000.10101000.00011011.001010 00=>192.168.27.40
30 - 24(Class C) => 6 bits are borrowed from host portion

Number of Subnets possible => 2^6 => 64

Number of host bits remaining available => 8(default) - 6(subnetbits) => 2 bits

Number of Hosts possbile in each subnet => (2^2)-2 => 4-2 => 2

Firt Host Address => 11000000.10101000.00011011.001010 01 => 192.168.27.41
Last Host Address => 11000000.10101000.00011011.001010 10 => 192.168.27.42

Previous Subnet Address:

11000000.10101000.00011011.001001 11 => 192.168.27.39

Next Subnet Address:

11000000.10101000.00011011.001 01001 => 192.168.27.41


Broadcast Address:
11000000.10101000.00011011.001010 11 => 192.168.27.43

Previous IP Address to the current host(IP) address:

11000000.10101000.00011011.00100111 => 192.168.27.39


Next IP Address to the current host(IP) address:
